masterball.name: Master Ball
masterball.desc: The best Ball with the ultimate performance. It will catch any wild Pokemon.

ultraball.name: Ultra Ball
ultraball.desc: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

brightpowder.name: Bright Powder
brightpowder.desc: An attack against the holder has its accuracy out of 255 lowered by 20.

greatball.name: Great Ball
greatball.desc: A high-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Poke Ball.

moonstone.name: Moon Stone
moonstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.
moonstone.desc: Evolves Nidorina into Nidoqueen, Nidorino into Nidoking, Clefairy into Clefable, Jigglypuff into Wigglytuff, Skitty into Delcatty, and Munna into Musharna when used.

firestone.name: Fire Stone
firestone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.
firestone.desc: Evolves Vulpix into Ninetales, Growlithe into Arcanine, Eevee into Flareon, and Pansear into Simisear when used.

thunderstone.name: Thunder Stone
thunderstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.
thunderstone.desc: Evolves Pikachu into Raichu or Alolan Raichu, Eevee into Jolteon, and Eelektrik into Eelektross when used.

waterstone.name: Water Stone
waterstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.
waterstone.desc: Evolves Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, Shellder into Cloyster, Staryu into Starmie, Eevee into Vaporeon, Lombre into Ludicolo, and Panpour into Simipour when used.

luckypunch.name: Lucky Punch
luckypunch.desc: If held by a Chansey, its critical hit ratio is always at stage 2. (25% crit rate)

leafstone.name: Leaf Stone
leafstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.
leafstone.desc: Evolves Gloom into Vileplume, Weepinbell into Victreebel, Exeggcute into Exeggutor or Alolan Exeggutor, Nuzleaf into Shiftry, and Pansage into Simisage when used.

metalpowder.name: Metal Powder
metalpowder.desc: If held by a Ditto, its Defense and Sp. Def are 1.5x, even while Transformed.

quickclaw.name: Quick Claw
quickclaw.desc: Each turn, holder has a ~23.4% chance to move first in its priority bracket.

psncureberry.name: PSN Cure Berry
psncureberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is poisoned. Single use.

przcureberry.name: PRZ Cure Berry
przcureberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is paralyzed. Single use.

burntberry.name: Burnt Berry
burntberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is frozen. Single use.

iceberry.name: Ice Berry
iceberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is burned. Single use.

kingsrock.name: King's Rock
kingsrock.shortDesc: Holder's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.
kingsrock.desc: Holder's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch. Evolves Poliwhirl into Politoed and Slowpoke into Slowking when traded.

bitterberry.name: Bitter Berry
bitterberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder is cured if it is confused. Single use.

mintberry.name: Mint Berry
mintberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder wakes up if it is asleep. Single use.

stick.name: Stick
stick.desc: If held by a Farfetch'd, its critical hit ratio is always at stage 2. (25% crit rate)

miracleberry.name: Miracle Berry
miracleberry.desc: (Gen 2) Holder cures itself if it is confused or has a status condition. Single use.

thickclub.name: Thick Club
thickclub.desc: If held by a Cubone or a Marowak, its Attack is doubled.

focusband.name: Focus Band
focusband.desc: Holder has a ~11.7% chance to survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP.

energypowder.name: Energy Powder
energypowder.desc: Restores 50 HP to one Pokemon but lowers Happiness.

berryjuice.name: Berry Juice
berryjuice.desc: Restores 20 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

scopelens.name: Scope Lens
scopelens.desc: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

leftovers.name: Leftovers
leftovers.desc: At the end of every turn, holder restores 1/16 of its max HP.

mysteryberry.name: Mystery Berry
mysteryberry.desc: (Gen 2) Restores 5 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP. Single use.

dragonscale.name: Dragon Scale
dragonscale.desc: Holder's Dragon-type attacks have 1.1x power. Evolves Seadra (trade).

berserkgene.name: Berserk Gene
berserkgene.desc: (Gen 2) On switch-in, raises holder's Attack by 2 and confuses it. Single use.

heavyball.name: Heavy Ball
heavyball.desc: A Poke Ball for catching very heavy Pokemon.

levelball.name: Level Ball
levelball.desc: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are a lower level than your own.

lureball.name: Lure Ball
lureball.desc: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon hooked by a Rod when fishing.

fastball.name: Fast Ball
fastball.desc: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon which are quick to run away.

lightball.name: Light Ball
lightball.desc: If held by a Pikachu, its Special Attack is doubled.

friendball.name: Friend Ball
friendball.desc: A Poke Ball that makes caught Pokemon more friendly.

moonball.name: Moon Ball
moonball.desc: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that evolve using the Moon Stone.

loveball.name: Love Ball
loveball.desc: Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are the opposite gender of your Pokemon.

sunstone.name: Sun Stone
sunstone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.
sunstone.desc: Evolves Gloom into Bellossom, Sunkern into Sunflora, Cottonee into Whimsicott, Petilil into Lilligant, and Helioptile into Heliolisk when used.

upgrade.name: Up-Grade
upgrade.desc: Evolves Porygon into Porygon2 when traded.

berry.name: Berry
berry.desc: (Gen 2) Restores 10 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

goldberry.name: Gold Berry
goldberry.desc: (Gen 2) Restores 30 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

parkball.name: Park Ball
parkball.desc: A special Poke Ball for the Pal Park.
